name: Animate
flavor: Split your conciousness with the Earth.

purposeDescriptions.low: animates any Earth that it contacts into a small, weak golem that lives as long as you can maintain focus
purposeDescriptions.mid: animates any Earth that it contacts into a stocky golem that lives as long as you can maintain focus
purposeDescriptions.high: animates any Earth that it contacts into an intelligent, indestructible golem powered by focus
